entry.def: Detente is a state of friendly relations between two countries when previously there had been problems between them.

example.ex: ...their desire to pursue a policy of detente...
example.tran: 他们寻求缓和两国关系的政策的愿望

example.ex: They have made the first move towards a detente.
example.tran: 他们已经迈出缓和两国关系的第一步。

means.word_mean: 1. the easing of tensions or strained relations (especially between nations)
